ai-ne28:1.1_0: Herein, what is the practice of taking up practices?
ai-ne28:2.1_0: “Right thought, “Possessed by right thought, right speech is right action.”
ai-ne28:2.2_0: serenity and discernment, and the path to the cessation of suffering.
ai-ne28:2.3_0: The one free from oppression at the end of the dwelling.
